newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian s/adj employment rises in April.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian s/adj employment rises in April.

text.p: Australia's seasonally adjusted estimate of the number of employed persons rose 37,100 in April to 8.42 million, against 8.38 million in March and 8.29 million a year earlier, the Bureau of Statistics said.
The seasonally adjusted unemployment rate was steady with March at 8.7 percent, compared with 8.8 percent in April 1996. Full-time employment rose around 28,400.
Economists had on average expected employment to rise around 35,000 in April, with the unemployment rate staying steady at 8.7 percent.
